name: Exact Change
description:
In this game, play as a cashier at a retail store, working out change for customers. People are randomly generated each time, so each playthrough is unique. In the end, you get to play in endless mode, where you help as many customers as you can before you get bored. Feel free to share your high score in the comments.

This game was made for the MFGJ Summer 2020, and was made entirely by me, Curruff.
